title: What motivates you to write your first blog post? - Quora

response.answer_text: what motivates me to write my first blog post? The answer to this question is very simple as well as complicated too… so why did I say complicated?….its because the content is second thing the first thing is heading of that content and in the starting, I had not even decided the title for my first blog post Then I sit and thought why did I create this blog, what was the intention of its creation then I got the answer that its a platform through which I can write on a topic about which I Love to write and it's a great & interesting thing to write something you love. Also, I can share my thoughts my views with others on a topic with which everyone can relate So, it was simple as the Love towards the topic I choose to write motivated me to write my first blog post and believe me it was an amazing experience as it was my first blog and first blog post. I come to know about blogging on 25 April 2019 and I wrote my first blog post on 27 April 2019 So here is my first blog post: Sarcastic Ishq Thank you for reading dear. :)

It always has to be about the passion, about something that moves me enough to write. You don't have to use big words, but if the passion is there it really comes through and people respond to it. For me, it's about what I see around me in life. It can be about people or places or issues that are close to my heart. Then I just get the urge to share my feelings or points of view with others, so we can talk about them and debate ideas. It's been a long time now but I think my first post was about the homeless in Singapore.
